about_the_game:
"Doll's Liminal" is a first-person exploration survival horror game set in a remote region of Japan. In the area known as "Doll's Liminal," an experiment called "Freight Transport Test" is conducted to see if one can pass through the area and reach the other side safely. The unit for measuring the depth of space is called "Depths," and the strange phenomenon of Japan, the "Doll's Liminal," attempts to take those who enter it to the deepest layer of "Depths 399."



Explore the interior of the Doll's Liminal, collect items, and aim for Depths 399. If you can shoot enough bullets into the "Blood Trail Dominator" located in Depths 399 and neutralize it, you can pass through the Doll's Liminal and reach the other side.

Many dolls are placed inside the Doll's Liminal, and many of them are believed to have souls within them. If a doll with a soul is left unseen, it will start moving and sneak up on intruders. If caught by a doll, you will be dragged into the deepest Depths in an instant. While it may seem convenient to want to go to Depths 399, if you are taken there without having enough equipment or ammunition, you will simply end up being toyed with by the dolls and have your soul taken away.



Avoid getting close to the dolls, evade them, and use your gun to take them down as you proceed through the Doll's Liminal with caution. Do not stare at walls at close range, as you may hear the sound of "Daruma-san Fell." During this, the dolls will rush towards you.

It can be difficult to decide if you should shoot the dolls, whether the ones with souls are moving or defeated, and whether you should interrupt your exploration to run away or use up your ammo to search for items. Shooting skills are not essential, but making judgments in various situations is important.



"Daruma-san Fell" can also be used as a strategic move to attract enemies or activate something, but there are many things to consider, and not many test subjects have successfully passed through the Doll's Liminal.

You will be given "Funerary Replacement Rounds." If you shoot a doll without a soul with this bullet, your soul will move to that doll. You may need a higher-ranked doll's body to gain resistance to the instability of space, aka dolls' dragging.

Our hope is to establish the Doll's Liminal as a transport route as soon as possible.

name: Doll's Liminal

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Avoid or defeat dolls that move when you're not looking, take their bodies, and make your way to the 399th dimension. This is a short horror game of fear and strategy, an exploration survival horror.
